plot: Michael meets Javier, a man he was never supposed to meet, and learns that he's made a grave mistake as Javier tells him of a personal, terrible, and transformational event from his childhood.
title: Michael & Javier
plot_es: Michael meets Javier, a man he was never supposed to meet, and learns that he's made a grave mistake as Javier tells him of a personal, terrible, and transformational event from his childhood.
plot_en: Michael meets Javier, a man he was never supposed to meet, and learns that he's made a grave mistake as Javier tells him of a personal, terrible, and transformational event from his childhood.
